abstract: Massive wildfire continues to sweep through Fort McMurray, Alberta, where hundreds of homes, vehicles and buildings have been destroyed.

headline.print_headline: Visit to Fort McMurray Reveals a Panorama of Destruction
headline.main: In Fort McMurray, Fire Leaves a Black Line of Destruction

snippet: A school intact on one side of a street, a home devastated on the other. In Fort McMurray, Alberta, where a fire continued Monday, contrasts abound.
lead_paragraph: A school intact on one side of a street, a home devastated on the other. In Fort McMurray, Alberta, where a fire continued Monday, contrasts abound.
